page.title: 15SUMMER EVENTS IN COLWYN
page.content: On Saturday{June 29th}the most recently completed section of the {Expressway}was officially opened by Welsh Under secretary Mr.Wyn Roberts. This section runs from Brompton Avenue in Rhos to Glan Conwy corner.This means that Colwyn Bay can now be completely bypassed and traffic will be able to flow freely through the town centre this summer. {* * * * * * * * * The Prince and Princess of wales visited Colwyn Bay on Tuesday{July {9th.}They came by train to officially open Llys Elian, a home for the elderly. {* * * * * * * * * } The centenary of Rydal School was celebrated through the night of{July {12th}in"THE BALL OF THE CENTURY".There were over{600}guests,each paying{25 {guineas}for a ticket.
